name: Keloglan
overview: Keloglan (stylized as Keloğlan on the title screen) is a Turkish language graphic text adventure for the Commodore 64 published in 1989 by Byte Computer. Keloglan is based on a fictional Turkish character of the same name from the nation's folklore/mythology. Help Keloglan to awaken the beautiful princess from death sleep. Be sneaky! Keloğlan,may be the the first Turkish commercial game released (we haven't come across an older commercially available game yet), is an adventure game made with the game editor named GAC (graphic adventure creator). Each screen of the game is graphically represented and the last screen is also available.
